name: Programming Languages
description: Explore various programming languages and their features.

name: Web Development
description: Learn about building websites and web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Database Management
description: Discover how to design, manage, and optimize databases for efficient data storage and retrieval.

name: Operating Systems
description: Understand the fundamentals of operating systems and their role in computer systems.

name: Networking
description: Learn about computer networks, protocols, and communication technologies.

name: Cybersecurity
description: Explore techniques and strategies to protect computer systems and data from cyber threats.

name: Cloud Computing
description: Gain insights into cloud computing technologies and their applications in modern computing environments.

name: Artificial Intelligence
description: Discover the principles and applications of artificial intelligence and machine learning.
